code: import{connect}from'react-redux';import Login from'../Components/LogIn';import{login as _login}from'../redux/actions/login';var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{user:state.user,userInfo:state.userInfo,openDrawer:state.openDrawer};};var mapStateToDispatch=function mapStateToDispatch(dispatch){return{login:function login(username,password){return dispatch(_login(username,password));}};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapStateToDispatch)(Login);
